ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: jay schultze <sartori69@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 20, 1999 1:01 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Description Thingy


>From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>
>
>
>>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Description Thingy
>>Date: Thu, 20 May 1999 12:27:42 -0400
>>
>>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>>
>>Yes, I have also seen it playing with options or something like that, but
I
>>really havent wanted to enter a descrition, as I dont look cool enough for
>>someone to check me out.
>
>Bah, I don't care what kind of armor you are wearing or weapon you are
>wielding...no one looks cooler when they are just standing around then a
>bard strumming on a mandolin =)
>
>Now strumming on a stick/flute that is suppose to be a drum is a different
>story...A little conga drum with your character model beating on it would
be
>very nice.
>
Swear to God this is true. First In-game meeting between me and a friend and
I was playin the drum. First thing he says is, hey man, whats up? What are
you doin, masturbating>?
